description.narrative: During the year 2017, the following activities were planned and implemented: i. Pre-project Advocacy and Sensitization in Zamfara state ii. Development of Training Manual on – SDGs and Gender-Responsive Legislations, Policies and Programmes iii. Training workshop for legislators, commissioners and other states executives, legislative aids and staff on SDGs and gender-responsive legislation, policies and programmes iv. Assessment of State’s Policies and Legislations related to Gender Equality v. Workshop to Validate Results of Assessment of State’s Policies and Legislations: vi. Publication of Result of Assessment vii. Development of a Training Manual for Civil Society Organizations viii. Training Workshop for Civil Society Organizations on Gender Programming for SDGs and Gender Budget Monitoring. Read more on the following link - https://drive.google.com/open?id=1KLAvIOp35L4sDrtMtJnYUxYhVImtH8dd

activity-date.narrative: This analytical overview covers the period 1 January to 31 December, 2017

recipient-country.narrative: This project is being implemented in Nigeria in Benue and Zamfara States

sector.narrative: The project aims to contribute to the attainment of gender equality in Nigeria
